item.title: OpenAI announces New Delhi office as it expands footprint in India
item.description: OpenAI has started hiring in India as it looks to expand its presence in the fast-growing South Asian tech market.

item.title: KitchenAid Promo Code: $150 Off in August 2025
item.description: Save on every purchase with top KitchenAid coupons from WIRED, including up to $150 off select countertop appliances.

item.title: Paramount Plus Coupon Codes and Deals: Up to 50% Off in August
item.description: Save on streaming with the latest Paramount+ promo codes and deals, including 50% off subscriptions, free trials, and more.

item.title: OpenAI lawyers question Meta’s role in Elon Musk’s $97B takeover bid
item.description: OpenAI says that Elon Musk met with Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg to discuss a $97 billion takeover bid of the ChatGPT-maker.

item.title: Anduril, Blue Origin to study how to transport cargo from orbit to Earth for the Pentagon
item.description: Blue Origin and Anduril notched small contracts that could revolutionize how the Pentagon transports cargo.
